summary: Forgotten herbs of Nord food you who are named Frost mirriam and Elves Ear , now got a 2k update.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#f9cb9c][size=6][u][b]My project:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[size=3][b][i]* Garlic not included ( yet)[/i][/b]
I am going to re-texture all forgotten and ignored items within the dlcs and main game[size=5].[size=3]
Someone said that it exists no re-texture for [/size][/size]Frost mirriam and Elves Ear. (Not anymore at least)
While the rest of your is either 1k or 4k the herbs in your kitchen looks sad and awful. 
This is my way to give back to the community. 
Comes in 1k or 2k Re-texure
[i]
And if you know any item that needs a upgrade to 4k texture, let me know.[/i]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=4][u][b]WILL BE DONE: [/b][/u][/size][/color]
- Will add separate for each, but for now comes in a bundle.
-Poison Bloom
- Glowing Mushrooms
- Glowing stones
- Lots of suggestions..
- 4K Option
- Parallax

[size=5][b][/b][size=5][size=3][size=5]Installation[/size][/size][/size]:[/size]
Click on download , I only know how NMM works so.
[/size]
[size=3][b][size=5]M[/size][/b][size=5]anual Installation[/size]
Drag / drop the "data" folder from the .7z archive to your Skyrim folder
(...Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim ) Please understand that i can not
give support for sorting out uninstallation problems if you installed
the mod manually and are unfamiliar with the folder structures and
files. If you are, then please use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] instead.
__________________________________________________________

[color=#f6b26b][b][size=5]FAQ:[/size][/b][/color]
[i][size=5][size=3][i]My game crashed after installing this:[/i]
[b]A: [/b][/size][/size][/i][size=5][size=3][i]The texture might be to big for your pc, optimize the texture and try again or wait for my 1k version.[/i][/size][/size][i]

I do not like how the Frost mirriam and Elves Ear flower looks:[/i]
[b]A: [/b]Then you perhaps should not install it.

[size=5][size=3][i]I want to add this to Steam / Russian website , would that be ok?:[/i]
[b]A: [/b]No[/size][/size]. I will do it myself if you show me the website.
[size=5][size=3]__________________________________________________________[/size][/size]

[b][u][color=#c9daf8][size=6]PERMISSIONS:[/size][/color]

[/u][/b][size=4]Feel free to use my textures ,no need to ask me for permission first. 
I only ask you two things: first, do not use them in paid mods or add to non-Nexus sites, and second, 
please give credit [size=3]to me. Because I worked hard on it.

[color=#ffe599][size=4][b]CREDIT:[/b][/size][/color]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][/center][center][url=https://faeth-design.deviantart.com/]FAETH-DESIGN[/url][i][b]﻿[/b][/i] FOR THE PHOTOS USED AS REFERENCE.
[b]
[size=3][u][color=#ead1dc]THANK YOU TO THE SUPPORT GIVEN:[/color][/u][/size][/b][size=3]
BRANDIIBUCK
SKYRIM EXTREME
SKYRIM UNLIMITED
[/size][/center]
author: MassiveMaster
